word_mean: 古生物病理学：研究古代保存下来的躯体(如木乃伊)的疾病

PerfectNetExp.abs: 当20世纪70年代这些科学家聚集在韦恩州立大学时,他们协助定义了一个新兴学科——古生物病理学(Paleopathology)。古生物病理学家检验死了很久的人类遗体以研究古代人类.
四古人骨病理学研究古病理学(Paleopathology)研究就是以考古发掘出土的古类骨骼直接作为研究对象,通过对这些古人骨标本某些病理现象的考察,从而可以了些疾病在.

means.word_mean: 1. the study of disease of former times (as inferred from fossil evidence)

auth_sentence.content: This claim was the precipitating factor for my entry to the fascinating field of paleopathology.
auth_sentence.res_content: This claim was the precipitating factor for my entry to the fascinating field of paleopathology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This claim was the precipitating factor for my entry to the fascinating field of paleopathology.
